channel.title: Website of Ben Jackman
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Ben Jackman

item.title: Article on The Term Funding Facility
item.description: Several of my colleagues and I have published an RBA Bulletin article on the Term Funding Facility (TFF).

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a macroeconomist and data scientist in Sydney, Australia. I currently lead the Term Funding Facility team at the Reserve Bank of Australia.

item.title: Building a static website in Blogdown
item.description: My personal site is built using Blogdown, a simple RStats package that uses the Hugo framework to create HTML for static websites.

item.title: Playing around with R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is known as a ‘R Markdown’ document.
